title: Ranked Promo bugged

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
I was in promos for diamond 3 after winning my lux game, in which 2 of them I played Annie (Won) and Xerath (Lost) As you see in the link.

Being 1 - 1 in promos I went to sleep and when I logged in again later today I got kicked out of promos at 98 points? No idea how I got kicked out of promos after only losing one match and I didn't log in or do anything else after that match.

replies.body: This is likely just a display issue - I still see you in your promos at 1 win 1 loss.

7  Wins     3  Losses    in promos .... went from silver 4 to bronze 4  !!!

Every advance of last year has been wiped out and if i climb 5 ranks again it will be wiped out in 12 months anyways ?
